points: Driving product development for a new immersive platform, collaborating directly with the Co-founder to shape vision and execution.
Generated critical documentation and refined workflows, ensuring clarity and efficiency across product functions.
Leveraged user insights and A/B testing to inform iterative product enhancements and optimize user experience.
Quickly immersed myself in the intricate landscape of an early-stage Layer 1 blockchain protocol.
Leveraged Generative AI and advanced prompting techniques to rapidly synthesize market trends and accelerate strategic decision-making.
Applied 'vibe coding' (rapid, iterative scripting) to build bespoke automation tools for streamlining repetitive tasks.
Proactively shaped and executed product discovery, community growth, and developer engagement strategies.
Demonstrated rapid adaptability by designing and implementing key performance indicators (KPIs) that directly aligned with strategic business goals.
Confidently collaborated directly with the CEO to architect and build a robust billing platform using Python, PostgreSQL, and REST APIs.
Championed agile product development cycles, ensuring on-time releases and maintaining continuous alignment with customer needs.
Proactively created interactive dashboards in Power BI for over 10 products.
Quickly understood and coordinated with US stakeholders to design and implement an efficient ETL framework.
Confidently integrated benefit modules and RESTful APIs into the clientspace platform, enhancing interoperability for over 30 clients.
Initiated and developed automated workflows to streamline task execution and ensure timely updates.
Swiftly assimilated market dynamics and proactively drove cross-functional collaboration.
Leveraged comprehensive market research to develop compelling product positioning and messaging that directly contributed to strategic market penetration.
Founded, scaled, and operated IBF BU, transforming it into one of the most active and recognized student-led Web3 communities in the country.
Drove significant community growth and ecosystem engagement by building multiple projects and organizing numerous hackathons.
Initiated and solidified strategic partnerships with multiple external organizations, including successful MOU signings.
Served as the sole on-campus representative, taking initiative to spearhead and lead significant growth for the community.
Successfully put the club 'on the map' within the university campus through targeted marketing and high-impact event organization.
Strategically designed and executed digital ad campaigns to boost product engagement.
Drove significant product sales and engagement on campus, leveraging effective communication and sales techniques.
Applied core SEO principles to enhance online visibility and contribute directly to outreach objectives.
